titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Connecticut Miscellanea 1884-1933 MS 012 MS 012 MS 012 MS 012
titlestmt.author: Processed by Ryan Bachman

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-02-02 07:51:14 -0800.

did.unittitle: Connecticut Miscellanea
did.abstract: This collection was gathered by Cornwall historian E.C. Starr, and relates to the general history of Connecticut.

archdesc.userestrict:
Use Restrictions Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the: Research library
Research library
Cornwall Historical Society
7 Pine Street
PO Box 115
Cornwall, CT 06753
Phone: 860-672-0505
E-mail: CornHistSoc@optonline.net

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); The Connecticut Miscellanea; Ms 012; box number; folder number; Cornwall Historical Society

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The overwhelming majority of the items in the collection are publications gathered by Starr during his lifetime.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection was gathered by Cornwall historian E.C. Starr, and relates to the general history of Connecticut. The overwhelming majority of the items in the collection are publications gathered by Starr during his lifetime. The collection is organized into three sections devoted to books, articles, and miscellaneous items.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Folders are arranged tpoically or by town, then chronologically within each series.
The files are grouped into 27 series:
